text:
RELIGION

Ramayanam: Kidaamby Narayanan, Gangai kondan mandapam, Triplicane, 7 p.m.

Bhagavatham: Jaya Srinivasan, Sri Rathnagiriswarar Temple, Besant Nagar, 6.45 p.m.; Sundara Kumar, Harihara Dhyana Nilayam, Chinmaya Mission Yoga Center II, Chinmaya Nagar, 6.45 p.m.

Gita: R. Aravindan, Andhra Mahila Sabha, Luz, Mylapore, 7.30 a.m.; Satyaprabhananda, Ramakrishna Mission Ashrama, T Nagar, 5.30 p.m.

Vishnu Sahasranamam: Sudha Seshayyan, Krishna Gana Sabha, T Nagar, 6.30 p.m.

Periyapuranam: Mukilai Rajapandian, Thalainagara Tamil Sangam, Mahalakshmi Street, Otteri, Vandalur, 5 p.m.

Thyagarajar and Bhakthi: Radha Baskar, Sitadevi Garodia Hindu Vidyalaya, Tambaram, 6.45 p.m.

Rig vedam: Rajagopalan, Asthika Samajam, Venus colony first street, 6.30 p.m.

CULTURE

Tamil Nadu Eyal Isai Nataka Manram: Bharat Ratna Dr. M.S. Subbulakshmi centenary celebrations, Youth Hostel, Indra Nagar, 6.30 p.m.

GENERAL

Anglo Indian Suburban Front: Annual Get-together, Minister Abdul Rahim participates, St. Anthony’s Shrine Hall, CTH Road, Avadi, 6 p.m.

Sri Pathanjali Maharishi Yogalayam Trust: Yoga camp, 37 Kamakshi Amman Naga Extension, Maangadu, 7 a.m.

Madras Dyslexia Association in association with Rotary Club of Madras Central: Dyslexia week celebrations, Asan Memorial School, Thousand Lights, 9.30 a.m.

Ramakrishna Mission Students Home: 111{+t}{+h}Home day, Old boys business meet, PS. Sivaswamy Salai, 2 p.m.

Holistic Philosophy Society: Seminar on ‘Holistic philosophy’, Nehru Vidyashram, Choolaimedu, 4 p.m.

International Medical Sciences Academy Tamil Nadu Chapter: Monthly meeting, K.J. Hospital, Poonamallee high road, 11 a.m.

Dr Shivaa’s Diabetes Care: Inauguration of online consulting platform, Hotel Green Park, 3 p.m.

Sankara Eye Hospital: Free eye cataract Screening Camp, K. Vinayakam Matric Higher Secondary School, Tiruvallur, 9 a.m.

Mohamed Sathak College of Arts and Science: College Alumni Association meet, Sholinganallur, 11 a.m.

Tamil Nadu Dr Ambedkar Law University: 7{+t}{+h}Cado fiesta 2016, Tamil Nadu Dr Ambedkar Law University premises, 4.30 p.m.

T.S. Srinivasan Charitable Trust: 36{+t}{+h}T.S. Srinivasan Endowment Lecture on ‘The Forgetful Brain’, ITC Grand Chola, Guindy, 4 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Mohan Foundation: Lecture on Jayadeva’s Ashtapadhis, New Giri Road , T Nagar, 6 p.m.

Vasantha Memorial Trust: Cancer Visitors Day, Sivagami Pethachi Auditorium, MCTM School, 9 a.m.
title: Chennai today
